title: Dengue Prevention Officers continue to occupy Health Ministry premises
content: Dengue Prevention Assistants who forcibly entered the Health Ministry premises on Wednesday (9) are refusing to leave until their demands are met.The Secretary of the All-Ceylon Dengue Prevention Assistants Association, T. A. Suranga Darshana told News 1st that a group continues to remain at the Health Ministry premises.â€œWe do everything in the health sector for Rs. 22,000/-. Now they are trying to deploy 847 of us for other functions as well. They employed us for 5 years and now are looking into our qualifications.
